page.title: 01INTRODUCTION/ GAZETTEER
page.content: THE AREA IS MOST OF SOUTH AND WEST CENTRAL READING,A TOWN ON THE RIVER THAMES 4O MILES WEST OF LONDON. THE TOWN IS CONSIDERED FAIRLY AVERAGE,A THEORY SUPPORTED BY THE B.B.C.WHO BASED THEIR DOCUMENTARY SERIES"POLICE" AND"THE FAMILY"IN READING THE N.E.OF THE BLOCK IS THE C.B.D.{(SHOPPING PAGE3,CHURCHES P6 {,THEATRE P ,PRINCIPAL BUILDINGS P3&4 {,)}HERE IS THE ORIGINAL SITE AND THE ABBEY{(CHANGE P20 ,RELIGION P6 ) MOST OF THE REST IS RESIDENTIAL {(HOUSING P2,FAMILY LIFE P9 INTERESTING {PEOPLE P9 ,)}ON BOTH THE LOWLAND FLOOD PLAIN AND UPLAND GLACIAL MORAINE {(RELIEF P2 ,ENVIRONMENT P2 ,) OPEN SPACE IS DIVIDED BETWEEN PLANNED PARKS{(RECREATION P10,GAMES 11 {,)}AND UNPLANNED LOWLAND(FARMING P ,) ALONGSIDE RIVER KENNET.
